            </tr>

                <td>fcntl.h</td>
                <td>open, close</td>
            </tr>

                <td>exit, malloc, free, NULL</td>
            </tr>

                <td>NULL, size_t</td>
            </tr>

                <td>bool</td>
            </tr>
            
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

    <h3>ASCII TABLE</h3>
    <table>
            <h3>ASCII TABLE</h3>
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Description</th>
                <th>Characters</th>
                <th>ASCII Codes</th>
            </tr>

        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Digits</td>
                <td>0 - 9</td>
                <td>48 - 57</td>
            </tr>

                <td>Uppercase letters</td>
                <td>A - Z</td>
                <td>65 - 90</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Lowercase letters</td>
                <td>a - z</td>
                <td>97 - 122</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Horizontal Tab</td>
                <td>\t</td>
                <td>9</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Line Feed</td>
                <td>\n</td>
                <td>10</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Vertical Tab</td>
                <td>\v</td>
                <td>11</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Form Feed</td>
                <td>\f</td>
                <td>12</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Carriage Return</td>
                <td>\r</td>
                <td>13</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Space</td>
                <td>' '</td>
                <td>32</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

</div>


## Commoly used abbreviations

- **`Int`** = integer

- **`Char`** = character

- **`argc`** = argument counter

- **`argv`** = argument vector
